item.description:
The weekend before Christmas is a usually a quiet weekend at the house. I may ride at Sunday River on Friday (only $39 for MA residents) and Attitash (possible deal) on Saturday.

This is a great weekend to get your Christmas shopping done at all the cheap outlets in North Conway -Staying home to shop is no excuse!!

If conditions are good I plan to stay at the house until the morning of Dec 23rd - another $39 day at Sunday River if you have college ID. My extended stay will depend on snow conditions, we will see.


$20 per night for guests. No special dinners or parties planned.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the house bar by 7pm.
item.name: weekend before Christmas
